name: Well, This is Awkward
description:
Welcome to the server!

This is a text-based adventure game where you take on the role of a fledgling moderator trying to help protect your server's community.  Interact with other members, make decisions based on the servers rules, or simply observe the chat. What kind of moderator will you be? And what consequences will your choices create?

Entry for the ViNoWriMo 2020 game jam.
